metadata.title: USN-7261-1 -- Vim vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that Vim incorrectly handled certain internal calls when scrolling a window. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-7261-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  vim - 2:9.1.0496-1ubuntu6.4 vim-athena - 2:9.1.0496-1ubuntu6.4 vim-common - 2:9.1.0496-1ubuntu6.4 vim-doc - 2:9.1.0496-1ubuntu6.4 vim-gtk3 - 2:9.1.0496-1ubuntu6.4 vim-gui-common - 2:9.1.0496-1ubuntu6.4 vim-motif - 2:9.1.0496-1ubuntu6.4 vim-nox - 2:9.1.0496-1ubuntu6.4 vim-runtime - 2:9.1.0496-1ubuntu6.4 vim-tiny - 2:9.1.0496-1ubuntu6.4 xxd - 2:9.1.0496-1ubuntu6.4 No subscription required
